select GUEST_TD,RESVID,NAME,UNIT_ID,ORDER_STATUS,MOBILE,ARRD,DEPD,CHANNEL,PLATFORM_CODE FROM JJZX_ORDER where GUEST_TD <> '0' and GUEST_TD is not null and (PLATFORM_CODE ='IOS' OR PLATFORM_CODE ='ANDROID') and DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) = date(ARRD) and ORDER_STATUS IN ('I','O') order by RESVID Asc
select RESVID,MOBILE from JJZX_FY WHERE SRESULT='0000' and (GSTATUS is null or GSTATUS = '0' or GSTATUS='1')
update JJZX_FY set GSTATUS=?GSTATUS, GRESULT=?GRESULT, MSGRES=?MSGRES where RESVID=?RESVID
